Package ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.screens

package ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.screens
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameHUD
    Heads-up display component for showing player information such as remaining time and collected crystals.
    InGameScreen
    The main gameplay screen used to render the world, background, HUD components, and radiation hazard effects.
    MainMenuScreen
    Main menu screen containing the title screen, transition animation, scrolling background, logo, and interactive buttons for starting the game or exiting.
    MenuButton
    A scalable animated menu button used on the main menu screen.
    WinScreen
    Win screen displayed after the player completes the game.
